mapper.select:
select
from community
where `name` LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{communityName },'%')
limit #{start},#{limit}
SELECT c.id FROM community c WHERE c.name=#{communityName}
mapper.sql: id, name, address, detailAddress, serviceTel, leader, leaderPhone, logo, backgroundImage
mapper.insert:
insert into community
id,
name,
address,
detailAddress,
serviceTel,
leader,
leaderPhone,
logo,
backgroundImage,

mapper.update:
update community
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detailAddress = #{detailaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serviceTel = #{servicetel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leader = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leaderPhone = #{leaderphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
backgroundImage = #{backgroundimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update community set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detailAddress = #{detailaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serviceTel = #{servicetel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leader = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leaderPhone = #{leaderphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, backgroundImage = #{backgroundimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
